{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3158907,"name":"Mihai Nicoara","username":"MrPresident","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/mrpresident/{size}/196728_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-07T02:14:22.588Z","cooked":"

How would i make a neo follow a falcon such that they turn at the same rate. My falcon is on an arm that is using the falcon magic motion feature. The neo is meant to turn a spool that winds up/down the electric chain for hand on the end of the arm. Any ideas are welcome.
Thank you in advance

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":14,"updated_at":"2023-03-07T02:14:22.588Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":6,"reads":192,"readers_count":191,"score":68.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":429217,"topic_slug":"how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon","display_username":"Mihai Nicoara","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":54110,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"4418 Programming Lead"},"post_url":"/t/how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon/429217/1","custom_user_title":"4418 Programming Lead","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3158916,"name":"","username":"tyhf21","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/t/b9e5f3/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-03-07T02:25:07.972Z","cooked":"

There might be a simpler way, but you could use position/velocity control on both and set them as the same. You’ll have to be careful though because they do behave differently.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":14,"updated_at":"2023-03-07T02:25:07.972Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":185,"readers_count":184,"score":57.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":429217,"topic_slug":"how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":49311,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon/429217/2","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"-1","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3158917,"name":"Eli Barnett","username":"Oblarg","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/oblarg/{size}/161674_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-07T02:27:20.961Z","cooked":"

This is a very very very bad idea. The motors will likely fight each other and damage themselves and/or the rest of your mechanism.

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":14,"updated_at":"2023-03-07T02:28:28.057Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":177,"readers_count":176,"score":75.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":429217,"topic_slug":"how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon","display_username":"Eli Barnett","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":49311,"username":"tyhf21","name":"","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/t/b9e5f3/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":12381,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Robot apartments! invisible suburbs! skeleton treasuries!"},"post_url":"/t/how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon/429217/3","custom_user_title":"Robot apartments! invisible suburbs! skeleton treasuries!","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3158918,"name":"Adan Silva","username":"DaMoose3512","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/damoose3512/{size}/221235_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-07T02:27:36.676Z","cooked":"

You can use the MotorControllerGroup class.

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":14,"updated_at":"2023-03-07T02:27:36.676Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":170,"readers_count":169,"score":69.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":429217,"topic_slug":"how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon","display_username":"Adan Silva","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://github.wpilib.org/allwpilib/docs/release/java/edu/wpi/first/wpilibj/motorcontrol/MotorControllerGroup.html","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"MotorControllerGroup (WPILib API 2023.4.2)","clicks":5}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":41820,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"3512A | Part-Time Software Help | Cal Poly SLO 27 |"},"post_url":"/t/how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon/429217/4","custom_user_title":"3512A | Part-Time Software Help | Cal Poly SLO 27 |","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3158920,"name":"","username":"tyhf21","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/t/b9e5f3/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-03-07T02:29:17.931Z","cooked":"

I dont think so, the different motors will have different velocities when given the same voltage

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":14,"updated_at":"2023-03-07T02:29:17.931Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":4,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":167,"readers_count":166,"score":38.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":429217,"topic_slug":"how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":41820,"username":"DaMoose3512","name":"Adan Silva","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/damoose3512/{size}/221235_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":49311,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon/429217/5","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3158924,"name":"Eli Barnett","username":"Oblarg","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/oblarg/{size}/161674_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-07T02:30:38.606Z","cooked":"

There are some losses to heat involved in doing this but it’s generally pretty tame. Mini-CIMS differ from CIMs in nominal free speed, but were designed to run in the same gearbox with them.

Competing velocity loops, on the other hand, will potentially oscillate and overheat quite badly.

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":14,"updated_at":"2023-03-07T02:31:08.993Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":5,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":164,"readers_count":163,"score":32.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":429217,"topic_slug":"how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon","display_username":"Eli Barnett","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":49311,"username":"tyhf21","name":"","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/t/b9e5f3/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":12381,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Robot apartments! invisible suburbs! skeleton treasuries!"},"post_url":"/t/how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon/429217/6","custom_user_title":"Robot apartments! invisible suburbs! skeleton treasuries!","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3158925,"name":"","username":"tyhf21","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/t/b9e5f3/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-03-07T02:30:48.480Z","cooked":"

True, you would have to tune it absolutely perfectly. It would make more sense to just swap the motors to be the same

Doesnt the CANSparkMax have an external follower method, I know its not fully supported, but may be worth a shot.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":14,"updated_at":"2023-03-07T02:59:40.660Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":141,"readers_count":140,"score":38.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":429217,"topic_slug":"how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon","display_username":"Jeffrey Morris","primary_group_name":"Swyft-Robotics","flair_name":"Swyft-Robotics","flair_url":"/uploads/default/original/3X/1/1/11d561f5bb3f02abd1014df6f9a83d9ec434d6d1.png","flair_bg_color":"","flair_color":"","flair_group_id":64,"badges_granted":[],"version":2,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":51948,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"SWYFT Robotics | 7125 AM"},"post_url":"/t/how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon/429217/8","custom_user_title":"SWYFT Robotics | 7125 AM","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3158944,"name":"Eli Barnett","username":"Oblarg","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/oblarg/{size}/161674_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-07T02:56:32.926Z","cooked":"

Fun fact: the SparkMax follower mode originally was built to interop with the CTRE Talon in this way, and rather than reciprocating CTRE responded by obfuscating their CAN protocol to break the feature.

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":14,"updated_at":"2023-03-07T02:57:00.752Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":8,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":4,"reads":128,"readers_count":127,"score":200.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":429217,"topic_slug":"how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon","display_username":"Eli Barnett","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":51948,"username":"DAflamingFOX","name":"Jeffrey Morris","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/daflamingfox/{size}/235166_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":10}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":12381,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Robot apartments! invisible suburbs! skeleton treasuries!"},"post_url":"/t/how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon/429217/9","custom_user_title":"Robot apartments! invisible suburbs! skeleton treasuries!","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":10}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":10,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3158952,"name":"Jeffrey Morris","username":"DAflamingFOX","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/daflamingfox/{size}/235166_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-07T03:01:59.145Z","cooked":"

Because it hurts CTRE somehow that a neo is copying the setpoint of a Falcon… how dare REV try something like that.

","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":14,"updated_at":"2023-03-07T03:01:59.145Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":9,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":115,"readers_count":114,"score":28.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":429217,"topic_slug":"how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon","display_username":"Jeffrey Morris","primary_group_name":"Swyft-Robotics","flair_name":"Swyft-Robotics","flair_url":"/uploads/default/original/3X/1/1/11d561f5bb3f02abd1014df6f9a83d9ec434d6d1.png","flair_bg_color":"","flair_color":"","flair_group_id":64,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":12381,"username":"Oblarg","name":"Eli Barnett","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/oblarg/{size}/161674_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":51948,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"SWYFT Robotics | 7125 AM"},"post_url":"/t/how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon/429217/10","custom_user_title":"SWYFT Robotics | 7125 AM","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3158957,"name":"Eli Barnett","username":"Oblarg","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/oblarg/{size}/161674_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-07T03:04:30.535Z","cooked":"

Cynically: the VEX/CTRE business model is largely built around convincing teams to stay in their ecosystem. The move is understandable from that perspective, though not really any less reprehensible.

Monopolies gonna (try to) monopoly.

","post_number":11,"post_type":1,"posts_count":14,"updated_at":"2023-03-07T03:05:04.205Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":10,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":107,"readers_count":106,"score":76.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":429217,"topic_slug":"how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon","display_username":"Eli Barnett","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":51948,"username":"DAflamingFOX","name":"Jeffrey Morris","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/daflamingfox/{size}/235166_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":12381,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Robot apartments! invisible suburbs! skeleton treasuries!"},"post_url":"/t/how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon/429217/11","custom_user_title":"Robot apartments! invisible suburbs! skeleton treasuries!","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":3,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3158960,"name":"Jeffrey Morris","username":"DAflamingFOX","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/daflamingfox/{size}/235166_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-07T03:09:04.574Z","cooked":"

Yea maybe it’s the same on the REV side, or at least it feels more voluntary, but damn at least I have motors that work. Anyway that is not the point of this thread.

","post_number":12,"post_type":1,"posts_count":14,"updated_at":"2023-03-07T03:10:26.803Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":11,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":102,"readers_count":101,"score":35.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":429217,"topic_slug":"how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon","display_username":"Jeffrey Morris","primary_group_name":"Swyft-Robotics","flair_name":"Swyft-Robotics","flair_url":"/uploads/default/original/3X/1/1/11d561f5bb3f02abd1014df6f9a83d9ec434d6d1.png","flair_bg_color":"","flair_color":"","flair_group_id":64,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":12381,"username":"Oblarg","name":"Eli Barnett","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/oblarg/{size}/161674_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":51948,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"SWYFT Robotics | 7125 AM"},"post_url":"/t/how-to-make-a-neo-follow-a-falcon/429217/12","custom_user_title":"SWYFT Robotics | 7125 AM","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3159064,"name":"bobbysq","username":"bobbysq","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/bobbysq/{size}/195893_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-07T05:35:01.443Z","cooked":"
Oblarg:

Cynically: the VEX/CTRE business model is largely built around convincing teams to stay in their ecosystem. The move is understandable from that perspective, though not really any less reprehensible.

Hey, I hear CTRE got a new COO recently. I’m sure he’s an upstanding member of the community who will help distance them from the Vex controversy.
